Text.Text: He-help... p-p-please...
*Uggghhh!*  I...am Yurst.  Cap-Captain.  Pl-please he-help.  They're... ki-killing... me.
Giants... killing... me.  Help... p-please.
Find them... s-stop them.
Welcome back, friend.  Have you given any more thought to removing those traps?
Again our paths cross, friend - I am forever in your debt.  Are you making any progress in removing those pitfalls?
Th-thank you, friend.  I f-f-feel better, but my wounds... they are deep... they still bleed.

BY THE GODS!  Reinforcements are... due to p-pass through these foothills any moment now!  If they run into the... the traps left by the rangers and druids living here - especially if they're as lethal as... the one at the entrance to their home - it'll be a m-m-massacre.

Soon, friend, all your questions will be answered - but now, time is of the essence!  From what I've heard, the area has been covered with traps - twelve in all, I believe.  If the reinforcements are to stand a chance, they need to be removed.
*The p-p-pain!*  *It's... un-b-bearable!*
Alas... I don't know.  They... came upon me... not long ago... perhaps they... *enhh*... find sport... in my suffering.
*Aaiiiyaaggg!*  Friend, have... *our* enemies... been slain?
Many thanks, to you, friend.  I-I would... would lift my body... and clasp your hand... were it not... fr-frozen... frozen to the ground beneath me.  Alas, I am broken.
I-I... uhhhhh... am too weak... my life... is... slipping.  My wounds... too... severe - for healing.  So... cold.  Can't... stop... bleeding.
This is... one of the m-many things I've overheard in... in my near-death state...
Well met... again, friend!  Please excuse my lazy tongue... the blood... in my mouth... has n-nearly frozen it shut.  Have you f-f-found anything to assist me?

Th-thank you... f-friend.  The pain is gone... my bleeding has stopped, but... but I fear my body and mind have been... damaged beyond all h-hope.   At least... at least I can pass on in peace... and for that I owe you much.

I'm Captain Yurst of the... Luskan relief forces.  My troops and I were... asked to rendezvous in Targos with Captain Mariner... from N-Neverwinter... but we were stopped south of here by a huge... wall of ice...
The fires from our... camp that night were b-barely warm when we were... attacked.  From the mountains swept wyverns led... led by a dragon woman....

They... seized my soldiers and I, taking us... towards an ice-carved t-temple.  In flight, I struck the wyvern hol-... holding me, and was dropped - saved... saved only by the pack of wolves I fell upon... may the gods bless them!
I've been lying... here... trying to recover ever since - not to mention being a... a target for... those infernal b-b-boulders...!
Alas... I don't know.  They... came upon me... not long ago... perhaps they... *enhh*... took sport... in my suffering.  But - your words... did you say you have defeated them?
I cannot guess... their motives, but I fear they do not s-stand with us - and as long as those traps are present, the reinforcements are in danger.  I... I... *uahhh*...
I... think they are to... the east.  They... came upon me... not long ago... enhh... they cannot be far.
I... I will soon be no l-longer...

But listen... listen closely: I have heard that something called An... Andora... has a magical barrier.  It is... f-f-flawed in such... a way as to allow safe passage to any creature that... that can resist Auril's breath - some of my gear may assist you in th-that regard.  Farewell... my friend...
Who's "killing" you?
Who are you?
What's wrong?
Why are those giants attacking you?
Why are those fomorian giants attacking you?
We took care of those giants that were attacking you.
Why were those giants attacking you?
I've no idea why those fomorian giants are attacking you, but we'll see what we can do.  Farewell.
I've no idea why giants are attacking you, but we'll see what we can do.  Farewell.
What do you want me to do?
I can't help you.  Farewell.
We took care of those giants that were attacking you.
Who's killing you?
We'll take care of your attackers.  Farewell.
I must leave now.  Farewell.
We took care of those giants that were attacking you.
We'll take care of those giants for you.  Farewell.
I've no idea why those fomorian giants are attacking you, but we'll see what we can do.  Farewell.
Giants?!  What giants?!
Why are giants killing you?
What do you want us to do?
I must leave now.  Farewell.
They've already been defeated.
We'll return once we've dealt with your enemies.  Farewell.
Where are they?
I must leave now.  Farewell.
Yes, we'll remove the traps and return.  Farewell.
What was your name again?
Who are you?
No I haven't.  Farewell.
What was your name again?
Who are you?
We're still looking.  Farewell.
I believe this Periapt of Wound Closure might work.
You're welcome.  Farewell.
Reinforcements?
Traps?
Rangers and druids?
All right, we'll remove the traps in this area and return.  Farewell.
We've removed them all... Captain Yurst?  Are you all right?
Farewell then.
We took care of them.
Farewell then.
No, but we've bribed their leader to keep his giants from attacking you.
No, but we've spoken to their leader - they'll not disturb you again.
Yes, the giants have been slain.
Why are those giants attacking you?
Who are your enemies?
What was your name again?
Who are you?
We'll return once we've dealt with your enemies.  Farewell.
Not yet.  Farewell.
What else can we do to help?
You're welcome.
Broken?
That's unfortunate.  Farewell.
We'll return when we've found something to stop your bleeding.  Farewell.
I have a Periapt of Wound Closure that might work.
Here, drink this elixir of health.
This healing potion may help - drink it down.
Perhaps a potion of extra-healing can help your wounds.
This Spirit Essence should make you feel better.
Can I offer you this potion of explos - uhhh, *healing* potion to drink?  I found it in my friend Oswald's airship.  It should *warm* you quite nicely.
I can't help you now.  Farewell.
Why have those rangers and druids trapped the foothills?
Yes, I believe this Periapt of Wound Closure might work.
Here, drink this elixir of health.
This healing potion may help - drink it down.
Perhaps a potion of extra-healing can help your wounds.
This Spirit Essence should make you feel better.
Can I offer you this potion of explos - uhhh, *healing* potion to drink?  I found it in my friend Oswald's airship.  It should *warm* you quite nicely.
Not yet.  Farewell.
What happened here, Captain Yurst?
Tell me what happened here.
Tell me what happened again.
Tell me more.
And then?
I see.
You mentioned reinforcements?
Yes, we took care of them.
I must take my leave.  Farewell.
Are you all right?
They weren't.  We took care of them.
I must take my leave.  Farewell.
